name: Music_5363.wav
keywords: ['contra alto clarinet', 'coughing', 'woman muffled speaking', 'live recording', 'simple motif']
caption: Here we have a live recording of a simple motif being played on a contra alto clarinet, which has a deeper tone than other clarinets. The player coughs at the beginning of the recording, mumbles a few words softly, and then plays a simple slow motif.
